meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Plumbago, typically with blue or white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The leadwort in the garden bloomed with beautiful blue petals.
meanings.sent2: I planted leadwort in my backyard for its lovely flowers.
meanings.sent3: The leadwort in the flower bed seemed to be showing off its vibrant colors.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as delicate and blue as a leadwort in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The leadwort's flowers were like tiny pieces of the sky scattered across the garden.

meanings.definition: A plant used in traditional medicine for its astringent properties.
meanings.sent1: The herbalist recommended leadwort to treat skin irritations.
meanings.sent2: Leadwort has been used for centuries in herbal remedies.
meanings.sent3: The leadwort plant seemed to have magical healing powers in the old tales.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like the astringent power of leadwort, firm and unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The astringent taste of leadwort reminded him of the bitter medicine his grandmother used to give him.
